tool_description:
Real-Time API for Financial News
Real-time Finance News API using the JSON payload to extract dynamic financial data
name: financelayer
title: financelayer

api_list.name: get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://financelayer.p.rapidapi.com/api.financelayer.com/v1/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "financelayer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://financelayer.p.rapidapi.com/api.financelayer.com/v1/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
